list.title: annotationCreatorMatches
list.description: Matches an annotation's creator URI against a list of URIs (e.g. from a user).

list.title: annotationCreatorName
list.description: Returns the craetor name for an annotation.

list.title: annotationCreatorUri
list.description: Returns the creator URI for an annotation.

list.title: compareFunctions
list.description:
An object of compare functions (can be used by array.sort for example).

TODO: Add more functions.

list.title: compareFunctions.mappingsByConcepts
list.description: Compare mappings by their first concept.

list.title: definition
list.description: Returns the definition of a JSKOS Item as an array. If there is no definition, an empty array will be returned.

list.title: getLanguages
list.description: Get the preference list either from store or from defaults (fallback)

list.title: isValidUri
list.description: Checks whether a string is a valid URI.

list.title: languageMapContent
list.description: Returns the content of a language map for a JSKOS Item.

list.title: mappingCSV~fromMapping
list.description: Converts a single mapping into a CSV line.

list.title: mappingCSV~fromMappings
list.description: Converts an array of mappings into CSV.

list.title: mappingRegistryIsStored
list.description: Returns whether a mapping registry has stored mappings (true = database) or not (false = recommendations).

list.title: module:jskos-tools
list.description: JSKOS Tools.

list.title: module:jskos-tools.ConceptScheme#conceptFromNotation
list.description: Map local notation to concept, if notation is valid. Requires scheme to have uriPattern or namespace.

list.title: module:jskos-tools.ConceptScheme#conceptFromUri
list.description: Check whether URI belongs to the scheme, return concept on success. Requires scheme to have uriPattern or namespace.

list.title: module:jskos-tools.ConceptScheme#isValidNotation
list.description: Check whether a string is a valid notation as defined by notationPattern.

list.title: module:jskos-tools.ConceptScheme#notationFromUri
list.description: Check whether URI belongs to the scheme, return local notation on success. Requires scheme to have uriPattern or namespace.

list.title: module:jskos-tools.ConceptScheme#uriFromNotation
list.description: Map local notation to URI. Does not check whether notation is valid! Requires scheme to have uriPattern or namespace.

list.title: module:jskos-tools.csvSerializer
list.description: Returns a function to serialize an array as CSV row as configured. See CSV Dialect (https://frictionlessdata.io/specs/csv-dialect/).

list.title: module:jskos-tools.exports.addContext
list.description: Add @context URI to a JSKOS resource or to an array of JSKOS resources.

list.title: module:jskos-tools.exports.clean
list.description: Recursively cleans JSKOS object by removing properties starting with _ or containing only uppercase letters. Warning: Works directly on the object without creating a copy!

list.title: module:jskos-tools.exports.compare
list.description: Compares two objects based on their URIs, using getAllUris.

list.title: module:jskos-tools.exports.compareMappingsDeep
list.description: Compare two mappings based on their properties. Concept sets and schemes are compared by URI.

list.title: module:jskos-tools.exports.conceptsOfMapping
list.description: Returns a list of concepts for a mapping.

list.title: module:jskos-tools.exports.copyDeep
list.description: Creates a deep copy of a JSKOS object, replacing possibly circular structures with open world [null] statements. All properties starting with an underscore (_) will be ignored.

list.title: module:jskos-tools.exports.getAllUris
list.description: Returns all possible URIs for a JSKOS object. Takes into consideration both the uri and identifier properties.

list.title: module:jskos-tools.exports.guessObjectType
list.description:
Guess the JSKOS Concept Type name from an object or name.

Short names are lowercase and object types ConceptOccurrence, ConceptMapping, ConceptBundle have short name occurrence, mapping , and bundle respectively.

list.title: module:jskos-tools.exports.isConcept
list.description: Checks whether JSKOS object is a concept based on type property.

list.title: module:jskos-tools.exports.isContainedIn
list.description: Checks whether an object is contained in a list of objects using compare.

list.title: module:jskos-tools.exports.isScheme
list.description: Checks whether JSKOS object is a concept scheme based on type property.

list.title: module:jskos-tools.exports.mappingCSV
list.description: Returns an object of preconfigured conversion functions to convert mappings into CSV.

list.title: module:jskos-tools.exports.mappingContentIdentifier
list.description: Returns a mapping content identifier. The identifier starts with urn:jskos:mapping:content: and takes concepts and type into consideration. It uses the mappingContent function to get relevant properties from the mapping.

list.title: module:jskos-tools.exports.matchObjectTypes
list.description: Checks if two objects have a matching object type. Returns false only if types for both objects could be guessed and they did not match.

list.title: module:jskos-tools.exports.merge
list.description:
Merges two JSKOS objects. Object properties will be merged deeply. Array properties will be combined (and URIs will be used for comparison if it's an array of objects).

The options property allows for different options:

  • mergeUris (boolean, default false) - appends b's URI to the result's identifier property if necessary, removes a's URI from the result's identifier property if necessary (useful for merging ConceptSchemes)
  • detectMismatch (array of strings, default []) - throws an error if the value at a certain path does not match between the two objects (allows for deep properties, e.g. prefLabel.de)
  • skipPaths (array of strings, default []) - provide paths to completely skip when merging

list.title: module:jskos-tools.exports.mergeUris
list.description: Merge URIs of two objects a and b into a by adding/removing URIs from identifier property.

list.title: module:jskos-tools.exports.objectTypes
list.description:
JSKOS Concept Types indexed by primary name (CamelCase).

For historical reasons name of Mapping is "ConceptMapping" and name of Occurrence is "ConceptOccurrence".

list.title: module:jskos-tools.exports.sortConcepts
list.description: Sorts a list of concepts by their notation, then URI.

list.title: module:jskos-tools.exports.sortSchemes
list.description: Sorts a list of schemes by their prefLabel (German or English), then notation, then URI.

list.title: module:jskos-tools.exports.usedObjectTypes
list.description:
Returns an array of main object type URIs used in a dataset.

This checks whether and which of fields concepts, types, mappings, schemes, concordances, occurrences, registries, properties, and annotations are used with non-empty sets.

Existence of property properties is indicated with URI http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property. Existence of property types is indicated with URI http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Class.

list.title: normalize
list.description:
Applies recursive unicode normalization to data.

  • If data is an array, it will recursively normalize all elements of that array.
  • If data is an object, it will recursively normalize all property values of that object.
  • If data is a string, it will apply unicode normalization to that string.
  • If data is of any other type, it will be returned as is.

list.title: notation
list.description: Returns the primary notation for a JSKOS Item. If there is no notation, it will return an empty string. Scheme notations will be uppercased.

list.title: prefLabel
list.description: Returns the prefLabel of a JSKOS Item. If there is no label, it will return the URI. If there is no URI, it will return an empty string.

list.title: selectLanguage
list.description: Selects a language tag from a language map or null if no language was found.

list.title: userOwnsMapping
list.description: Returns true if the user owns the mapping (i.e. is first creator), false if not.
